description: This limoncello cocktail is a twist on the Mojito, a popular cocktail from Havana, Cuba! This extremely strong lemon liqueur is frequently consumed as&nbsp;shots at the end of a meal. The limoncello offers a pure lemon flavor that lemon juice alone cannot provide.
